column4: Provide information about and support analysis using citation data for drivers involved in a crash event.
Integrate with the West Virginia Uniform Citation Database to allow for electronic transfer of citation data from law enforcement.
Allow an authorized user to enter and update citation data online in the ERP safety management function on an exception basis.
